title: Dish Network launches $30 5G cellular service in Las Vegas
content:
According to a new report, Dish Network will finally debut its 5G network, Project Genesis, giving consumers a new option for cellular service. While there are expansion plans, the service will be first made available in Las Vegas, Nevada. Ahead of its launch, the service and network were getting tested by early adopters in beta.

The post Dish Network launches $30 5G cellular service in Las Vegas appeared first on XDA.
description: Today, Dish Network launched its 5G cellular network. The service will cost $30 and will first offer coverage in Las Vegas, Nevada.
